quote: Every bit as well as Obamacare did.
quotePlain: Every bit as well as Obamacare did.
name: Ron Johnson

checks.quote: The bill would keep the Affordable Care Act’s prohibition on denying coverage to people with pre-existing health conditions. But states could obtain waivers that would allow insurers -- unlike under Obamacare -- to charge people with pre-existing conditions premiums and provide them lesser benefits.
checks.quotePlain: The bill would keep the Affordable Care Act’s prohibition on denying coverage to people with pre-existing health conditions. But states could obtain waivers that would allow insurers – unlike under Obamacare – to charge people with pre-existing conditions premiums and provide them lesser benefits.

claims.title: Graham-Cassidy protects coverage for pre-existing conditions
claims.negative: Graham-Cassidy doesn't protect coverage for pre-existing conditions
claims.negativePlain: Graham-Cassidy doesn’t protect coverage for pre-existing conditions
claims.truth: States could apply for waivers which could allow insurers to charge those with pre-existing conditions significantly more.
claims.truthPlain: States could apply for waivers which could allow insurers to charge those with pre-existing conditions significantly more.
